updates.title: AI agents are experiencing explosive enterprise adoption with Sierra reaching $100M ARR in under two years, signaling December could see major AI agent platform announcements and funding rounds.

ChatGPT's new group chat feature launching globally suggests December will bring collaborative AI tools across major platforms, potentially transforming creative team workflows and design collaboration.

Google's Gemini 3 early access rollout and Android Auto integration indicate major AI assistant updates coming in December, potentially affecting creative workflow integrations and voice-controlled design tools.

Rising concerns over AI manipulation and safety issues could drive regulatory changes in December, potentially impacting how creative AI tools handle user interactions and content generation policies.

Meta's expansion into electricity trading for data centers signals infrastructure investments that could accelerate AI model training capabilities and creative AI tool performance improvements in early 2026.
